weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm cold and white. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am made of tiny crystals.
🧤 You can make snowballs with me.
⛄ I cover the ground in winter.

weather.question: I am hot and yellow, and I shine in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 I help plants grow.
😎 You need sunglasses when I am bright.
🌡️ I make it warm outside.

weather.question: I fall from the sky and make everything wet. What am I?

hints.text: ☔ You need an umbrella when I come.
💧 Puddles are made by me.
🌱 Plants love me.

weather.question: I move the leaves on the trees and can blow your hat away. What am I?

hints.text: 💨 You can't see me, but you can feel me.
🪁 I can make kites fly high.
🍃 I make the leaves dance.

weather.question: I am gray and float in the sky. Sometimes I bring rain.

hints.text: 🐑 I can look like fluffy sheep.
🌧️ Sometimes I'm dark and heavy.
✈️ Airplanes fly through me.

weather.question: I appear after the rain, with many colors in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and violet.
☀️ I need the sun and rain to show up.
✨ People say there's gold at the end of me!

weather.question: I am ice that falls from the sky, sometimes during a thunderstorm. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am frozen rain.
🤕 I can hurt if I hit you.
🏏 I am much smaller than a snowball.

weather.question: I am a big storm with strong winds that spin around and around. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I am a very dangerous storm.
🏠 People have to find safe places when I come.
🌪️ Another name for me is cyclone.

weather.question: I am a flash of light in the sky during a storm, followed by a loud noise. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I am very bright.
⛈️ I come with thunder.
💡 I am a form of electricity.

weather.question: I am the loud rumbling sound you hear after lightning. What am I?

hints.text: 🔊 I am loud and scary for some.
👂 You hear me after you see the flash.
💥 I am caused by the rapid heating of air.

bug.question: I have spots and I can fly. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I often have red and black colors
🌿 I like to land on plants
✨ I am thought to bring good luck.

bug.question: I make honey and live in a hive. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐝 I buzz around flowers.
🍯 I am very sweet.
👑 I live with a queen.

bug.question: I crawl in the ground and build big hills. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am a very hard worker.
💪 I can lift things much bigger than me.
🏘️ I live with lots of friends.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar and become something beautiful that flies. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have colorful wings.
🌸 I like to drink nectar from flowers.
🐛 I go through metamorphosis.

bug.question: I jump very high and eat plants. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am usually green.
🎻 Some say I play music.
🌿 I can eat a lot of grass.

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my dinner. Who am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I have eight legs.
🕷️ People are often scared of me
🏠 My web is my home.

bug.question: I light up at night and fly around. What am I?

hints.text: 💡 I glow in the dark.
🌙 You see me when it's dark.
✨ I help you see at night.

bug.question: I am long and skinny and I wiggle in the dirt. What am I?

hints.text: 🪱 I help plants grow.
🌧️ I come out when it rains.
🌱 I live under the ground.

bug.question: I have big eyes and catch other bugs while flying. What am I?

hints.text: 👀 I have a big face
🍃 I live by the water.
💨 I fly really fast.

bug.question: I fly around lights at night and am related to butterflies. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 My wings often have duller colors than butterflies
🌙 I am nocturnal
💡 I'm attracted to artificial lights
